title: Indian roti
description: Try this freshly baked, beautifully spiced Indian flatbread with a curry instead of rice. Easy and satisfying to make.
ingredients: 225g/8oz chapati flour (available in Indian grocers and large supermarkets), plus extra for dusting
1½ tsp dried fenugreek leaves (or a handful of fresh fenugreek leaves, roughly chopped)
ghee or unsalted butter, melted, for brushing over bread
